title: New mac update slowed game
body: Just updated to lates mac os and it slowed down the game significantly.  Ive tried deleting unused applications and shutting down background programs to no avail. Any suggestions on fixes?

replies.body: Can you go into more detail on what you mean by slowing down?  What are you seeing that's happening while in-game?  Does it impact the client as well?
the client is fine the charicter animation is slow then skipps to catch up.

Thanks for the info!  It sounds like it could be packet loss, but I'd like to know for sure.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) on these impacted games for an overview, and let me know what you find.

No network lags, no packet loss. The FPS is fluctuating, sometimes between 59-60 fps and since the new patch you can notice a micro stuttering in animations, no rubberbanding or any lag issues. 
I play on an fully maxed out iMac 27'' with 40gb Ram and nothing open except lol and tried 5k, 4k, some other resolutions and settings and it doesnt really matter. I tried so many options in game client. The new patch mucked sth up.
